basics.name: Mohammed Omer
basics.label: PhD Student
basics.summary: A mechanical engineer with a passion for inclusive and equitable design

work.name: Laboratory for Manufacturing Technology, Helmut Schmidt University
work.summary: I coordinate the Open Lab Starter Kit project with a budget of 2 Million euros and carry out my own research on frugal design of open source machine tools
highlights: Teaching the courses of Manufacturing technology (Bachelor) and Manufacturing Machine tools (Master)
Carry out workshops on digital fabrication topics
Published my work on several internation conferences and journals

work.name: Airbus
work.summary: I worked on creating assembly documentation of mechanical, hydraulic and electrical wiring of airbus commercial aircraft
highlights: I got to learn the insides of complex manufacturing systems within the aerospace sector
Working in the manufacturing division, I gained valuable practical shopfloor experience

work.name: Faurecia
work.summary: I worked on creating assembly documentation of mechanical, hydraulic and electrical wiring of airbus commercial aircraft
highlights: Building and optimizing a hot forging simulation in FORGE NXT
Simulation of forces occurring in the tool during the forming process
Selection of suitable additive manufacturing processes and materials
Cost-effectiveness analysis of additive-manufactured tools in comparison to conventional tools
Developing a multi-physics fluid-thermal coupled simulation in LS-Dyna for cooling channels
CAD models preparation and meshing in HYPERMESH
Modeling of conformal cooling channels in CATIA V5
Feasibility study on additive manufacturing potential in forging dies
Running Simulations in Linux-based Cluster with script automation
Attended a workshop on Multiphysics simulations from DYNAMORE in Stuttgart

education.institution: Technical University of Dortmund, Dortmund, Germany
courses: Forming technology, machining, additive manufacturing, fatigue analysis, automation and robotics, finite element analysis

awards.title: DAAD scholarsips for bachelors and masters
